tidbits.title: Volcanic Landscapes
tidbits.description: El Salvador is known for its stunning volcanic landscapes, with many volcanoes dotting the country, offering picturesque scenery and hiking opportunities.

tidbits.title: Rich Pupusa Tradition
tidbits.description: Pupusas, a traditional Salvadoran dish, are thick corn tortillas stuffed with various fillings like cheese, beans, and meats, representing a staple of local cuisine.

tidbits.title: Surfing Paradise
tidbits.description: The country's coastline, particularly in places like La Libertad, attracts surfers from around the world, offering great waves and a vibrant surfing culture.
